TopicTitle: how do people get such cool stuff?!

Articles.Content: ive seen people get laser guns and boats and stuff, how do i get them is there an update ive missed or something?
Check out the 'Mod Showcases' forum. Most players use mods to improve the KSP experience, either by adding parts, information, mechanics, or anything else to the game.

You can also create your own parts, but you will have to learn how to make them(I barely know how to make proper edit to the .CFG files so I can't help you on that).

PS:welcome to the forums!
